mutants.code:
import math

def count_distributions(N, R):
    if N <= R:
        return -1
    N = N - 1
    R = R - 1
    numerator = math.factorial(N)
    denominator = math.factorial(R) * math.factorial(N - R)
    result = numerator // denominator
    return result % 10000007

import math
